publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5929 Kenny MacAskill: Serious and Organised Crime—That the Parliament recognises that serious organised crime can have a devastating impact on communities and businesses in Scotland; further recognises that tackling this menace should be a key priority for a Safer and Stronger Scotland; supports the role of the Serious Organised Crime Taskforce in spearheading Scotland’s commitment to address this type of crime; supports Scottish law enforcement in implementing the taskforce’s serious organised crime strategy, Letting our Communities Flourish, and supports the view that serious organised crime cannot be seen to pay. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
